code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Card=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;console.log(data);const readMore=url=>{window.open(url);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cardContainer",children:data.map((curItem,index)=>{if(!curItem.urlToImage){return null;}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:curItem.urlToImage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"title",onClick:()=>window.open(curItem.url),children:curItem.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:curItem.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>window.open(curItem.url),children:"Read More"})]})]});}})});};export default Card;
